overview: CIA operative Nelson Crowe is tasked with a deadly assignment: infiltrate a highly secret industrial espionage firm. Once inside, he teams with Margaret Wells, a master spy and seductive manipulator, in a plot to overthrow the organization's sinister president, which leads them into a darkly mysterious web of intrigue -- and shocking murder!
tagline: Bribery. Blackmail. Murder. Specialities of the house.
cast: Laurence Fishburne|Ellen Barkin|Frank Langella|Michael Beach|David Ogden Stiers
